channel.title: Some questions :D

item.title: Some questions :D
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

1: how i add vegenace? i don’t find the tutorial for add it.

2: any 1 can help me with ancient autocast?

3:plx help me to fix my ice barrage he didn’t work in players :if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(2876); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; //stillgfx(360, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

ahh i also find this:

[code] }

	if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage
		if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) {
		stillgfx(360, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
		stillgfx(360, absY, absX);
		hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45);
		teleportToX = absX;
		teleportToY = absY;
        addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic);
        setAnimation(50);

server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200;
} else {
sendMessage(“You do not have the right level to cast this spell.”);
}
}[/code] and

[code]if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)

			if(playerLevel[6] >= 90) 
			{

			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if(playerLevel[6] < 90) {
sendMessage(“You need a higher mage lvl”);
}[/code]
4: how i add safezones?

tnx if you reply
